location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 12: James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter is written in response to Francis Warden's letter of 1 August, which included for James Dow's guidance copies of instructions isssued to the Superintendent of the Marine and to the Political Agent at Kishme [Qeshm]. Dow states that the instructions shall meet with every possible attention.
